pages.name: Serenade of the Nether
pages.text: Use a Ritual Diviner for easier contruction.
Generates a source of lava from the master ritual stone.$(br2)$(#ff0000)Fire Runes: 4$()$(br2)Total Runes: 4

Will Augmentations:$(br2)(Raw) Decreases the LP cost of placing lava and allows lava to be placed insided of a linked container.$(br)(Corrosive) Entities within range that are immune to fire are damaged severely.$(br)(Destructive) Lava placement range is increased based on total Will.$(br)(Vengeful) Entities in this range are afflicted by Fire Fuse.$(br)(Steadfast) Players in this range have Fire Resist applied.
